name: UIStepper
desc: A control for incrementing or decrementing a value.

items.name: var isContinuous: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to send value changes during user interaction or after user interaction ends.

items.name: var autorepeat: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to repeatedly change the stepperâ€™s value as the user presses and holds a stepper button.

items.name: var wraps: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the stepper can wrap its value to the minimum or maximum value when incrementing and decrementing the value.

items.name: var minimumValue: Double
items.desc: The lowest possible numeric value for the stepper.

items.name: var maximumValue: Double
items.desc: The highest possible numeric value for the stepper.

items.name: var stepValue: Double
items.desc: The step, or increment, value for the stepper.

items.name: var value: Double
items.desc: The numeric value of the stepper.
